Description.description: Used to store information about a stage in the deployment process.
Picklist to determine the type of approval required for this step
The path to the build template for this step in the pipeline repository.
Determines if a user can deploy to this step
Unique identifier for entity instances
The name of the source branch for deploying a solution using this step
The name of the target branch for deploying a solution using this step
Required name field
The order of this step in the profile
The type of step (e.g. Development or Deployment). Deployment pipelines will not be generated for the former
Unique identifier of the user who created the record.
Date and time when the record was created.
Unique identifier of the delegate user who created the record.
Sequence number of the import that created this record.
Unique identifier of the user who modified the record.
Date and time when the record was modified.
Unique identifier of the delegate user who modified the record.
Unique identifier for the organization
Date and time that the record was migrated.
Status of the Deployment Step
Status of the Deployment Step
Reason for the status of the Deployment Step
Reason for the status of the Deployment Step
For internal use only.
Time zone code that was in use when the record was created.
